name: Super Gem! World
description:
Super Gem! World is a 2-4 player collect-a-thon around a dying a planet! Collect the gems that fly into space as your large space stations blast the planet with lasers! you might be able to use your own fighter ship's weapons to slow down the enemy if you could just get close to them....

Created by Landen Dwyer & Kyle Dwyer for the 2018 Global Game Jam

requires 1-4 dual analog controllers. face keys to fire, right trigger to shoot. a player can use the keyboard using the arrow keys and Z and X, but its not great...
